metadata.subject: Refugee property
Government sale of real property
metadata.title: Procès-verbal de première enchère & à adjudication définitive : vente de bien nationaux provenans d'émigrés : département des Basses-Alpes, district de Digne
metadata.creator: Digne (France)
Digne (France)
metadata.description: Act regarding the sale of properties confiscated from émigrés in the district of Digne; blank spaces left to fill in the date and exact location of particular properties
Not in Martin & Walter. Révolution française
Newberry's copy includes location and date of sale in ms., filling some blanks on p. [1]: Canton d[e Vallanssole], municipalité d[e Greoux]. Le [17 prairial, l'an second] ..

Additional inscription below printed text, p. [1], on Newberry's copy: Suite de la vente des biens nationaux provenants des émigrés Therese Henriette, et Constance an di[...?]et situés dans le terroir de Greoux, 22me. division appellée les Sibierès, no. 35. Cultivé par Joseph Reille et Jean Agnel ..
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title on cover page. Damaged, stained pages and cover.
